title: Bloomberg Launches Green Bond-Tilted Versions of its Flagship Fixed Income Indices - ESG Today
summary: Bloomberg has launched new green-tilted versions of some of its flagship fixed income indices. The new indices aim to enable investors to increase exposure to sustainable investments with products that maintain similar characteristics of the parent benchmarks. Green bond issuance volumes have surged over the past several years as companies and governments have increasingly used them to finance their environmental sustainability and transition initiatives.
